scripts.app_build: npm run lib_build && ng build --prod --base-href /angular-split/ && npm run app_lazy_build && npm run app_lazy2_build
scripts.app_analyze: npm run lib_build && ng build --prod --stats-json && webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/angular-split-app/stats.json
scripts.lib_build: ng build angular-split && npm run lib_copy_license && npm run lib_copy_readme
scripts.lib_tgz: npm run lib_build && cd dist/angular-split && npm pack
scripts.lib_pub_next: npm run lib_build && npm publish --tag next ./dist/angular-split
scripts.lib_pub_latest: npm run lib_build && npm publish --tag latest ./dist/angular-split
scripts.cypress_dev: npm run lib_build && ng build --prod && concurrently "ng serve --port 4242" "cypress open"
scripts.cypress_prod: npm run cypress_build && run-p --race cypress_serve cypress_open
scripts.cypress_ci: npm run cypress_build && run-p --race cypress_serve cypress_run
scripts.cypress_build: npm run lib_build && ng build angular-split-app --prod --base-href /angular-split-app/ && ng build angular-split-app-lazy --prod --base-href /angular-split-app/lazy --deploy-url /angular-split-app/lazy/ && ng build angular-split-app-lazy2 --prod --base-href /angular-split-app/lazy2 --deploy-url /angular-split-app/lazy2/
